text: @jaketapper Wait not just the media (and by media I mean @FoxNews), @realDonaldTrump is personally responsible for spreading misinformation and outright lies about #COVID19. Where is his responsibility? Who will hold him accountable?!? No really who?!? #TrumpLiesAmericansDie
